articles.description: One of the most common observations out of the Patriots’ offseason program is that quarterback Mac Jones is in noticeably better shape than he was as a rookie. Jones says that’s the result of plain old hard work.Jones told Phil Perry of NBCSportsBoston.com th…
articles.content: billshistorian says:July 16, 2022 at 11:55 amMac was much better than I expected. However, where is his improvement going to come from. The game is more and more about what you do when the play break… [+1063 chars]

articles.author: Gabe Lacques
articles.title: Clayton Kershaw in 'vintage' form for Dodgers against Angels - USA TODAY
articles.description: Los Angeles Dodgers ace Clayton Kershaw was in "vintage" form Friday night, taking a perfect game into the eighth inning against the Angels.
articles.content:
ANAHEIM, Calif. In his 15 well-decorated years in the major leagues, there have been nights Clayton Kershaw has been more dominant.
There have been nights he was all the Los Angeles Dodgers had, and… [+6126 chars]
